channel.title: Illuminatus! Podcast
channel.description: Excerpts from Illuminatus! Trilogy featuring Part II - THE GOLDEN APPLE. Illuminatus! Unabridged Audiobook available via www.deepleafaudio.com

channel.itunes:author: Robert Shea and Robert Anton Wilson
channel.itunes:subtitle: Excerpts from Illuminatus! Trilogy featuring choice cuts from Illuminatus! Part II - THE GOLDEN APPLE. Illuminatus! Unabridged Audiobook available via www.deepleafaudio.com
channel.itunes:summary:
"Nausea, then microamnesia, then the laughing jag, then sex. Be patient. The clear light comes next. Then we can discuss Truth. As if we haven't been discussing it all along." - Hagbard Celine
Culled from the 10 hour audiobook of Shea and Wilson's conspiratorial high-camp masterpiece, Illuminatus! Podcast presents THE GOLDEN APPLE in all its golden, frenzied splender.
channel.itunes:keywords: Illuminatus, Illuminatus!, Illuminatus Audiobook, Illuminatus audio book, Illuminati, masons, free masons, freemasons, conspiracy, conspiracy theories, Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: ILLUMINATI PROJECT MEMO #19
item.description:
MEMO #19 SUMMARY: The numbers 5 and 23 fit in with this Illuminati project. It's from a book of mathematical and logical paradoxes: How to Torture Your Mind. 2 and 3 are even and odd; 2 and 3 are 5; Therefore, 5 is both even and odd. The damned book, by the way, provides no solutions to the paradoxes.

Excerpts from Illuminatus! Trilogy featuring ILLUMINATI PROJECT MEMOS chronicling the history of the Illuminati. Illuminatus! Unabridged Audiobook available via www.deepleafaudio.com
